data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Hey r/fitness,

I am Steven Low, author of “Overcoming Gravity: A Systematic Approach to Gymnastics and Bodyweight Strength” released around 1.5 months ago.

Short bio: Former gymnast. Performed for Gymkana for 5 years, and currently an assistant coach of 3 years with Gymkana, who recently appeared on America's Got Talent. Degree in Biochemistry from UMCP, currently at UMB for Physical Therapy.

I write for Eat. Move. Improve, and have written some articles such as The Fundamentals of Bodyweight Strength Training, Shoes, Sitting, and Lower Body Dysfunctions, So you hurt your lower back, A closer look at vitamin D, and On tendonitis which have appeared here.

I will continue fielding questions all throughout Saturday.

Note: Make sure you ask your questions in response to me, as I will be checking new mail for ones to answer.

Additionally, and I almost forgot I would like to say that Jim Bathurst (BeastSkills) and Roger Harrell (DrillsandSkills) are people who I should've put in the acknowledgements section of the book.
